description:
Class C considers various strategies for the special exam, but they all lack a decisive factor. Hirata remains disappointed in the class vote result. Ayanokoji calls out to Hirata, who acts coldly towards Mii-chan who is worried about him.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Fujouri na Ketsuron ni Itaru Daiichi no Geiin wa, Kaiketsu no Shudan ga Fusoku Shite Iru Koto Da
La première cause des conclusions absurdes, je l’attribue au manque de méthode
The First Cause of Absurd Conclusions I Ascribe to the Want of Method.
不条理な結論に至る第一の原因は, 解決の手段が不足していることだ
